benchmark_details.name: Task-oriented Robotic Manipulation with Vision Language Models
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce a new dataset that includes object details along with manually defined spatial relationships, providing a comprehensive framework for improving robotic interaction with objects in a task-oriented context.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance spatial reasoning for robotic manipulation through a new dataset

data.source: Simulated images using Blender representing various object configurations
data.annotation: Manually annotated object attributes and spatial relationships
